EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower | {!Account.Name} Contract [EchoSign]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}:
Your application to work with SunPower as a Residential Partner has been approved. The next step in the process will be to execute an agreement. We use an online signature technology called EchoSign that complies with all legal standards and attaches a digital signature to secure electronic documents. Please look for a message from EchoSign in the next few moments.
Please review the terms and conditions of the agreement, paying particular attention to the representation of your company name on the signature page. All agreements with SunPower should include your official company name, as represented in your terms of incorporation. After we receive your response, a fully executed copy will be returned to you for good standing order of your files.
